sn47.4:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu viharati salaya brahmanagame.
sn47.4:1.2: Tatra kho bhagava bhikkhu amantesi …pe… etadavoca:
sn47.4:2.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nava acirapabbajita adhunagata imam dhammavinayam, te vo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catunnam satipatthananam bhavanaya samadapetabba nivesetabba patitthapetabba.
sn47.4:2.3: Etha tumhe, avuso, kaye kayanupassino viharatha atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, kayassa yathabhutam nanaya;
sn47.4:2.4: vedanasu vedananupassino viharatha atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, vedananam yathabhutam nanaya;
sn47.4:2.5: citte cittanupassino viharatha atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, cittassa yathabhutam nanaya;
sn47.4:2.6: dhammesu dhammanupassino viharatha atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, dhammanam yathabhutam nanaya.
sn47.4:3.1: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekha appattamanasa anuttaram yogakkhemam patthayamana viharanti, tepi kaye kayanupassino viharanti atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, kayassa parinnaya;
sn47.4:3.2: vedanasu vedananupassino viharanti atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, vedananam parinnaya;
sn47.4:3.3: citte cittanupassino viharanti atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, cittassa parinnaya;
sn47.4:3.4: dhammesu dhammanupassino viharanti atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, dhammanam parinnaya.
sn47.4:4.1: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahanto khinasava vusitavanto katakaraniya ohitabhara anuppattasadattha parikkhinabhavasamyojana sammadannavimutta, tepi kaye kayanupassino viharanti atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, kayena visamyutta;
sn47.4:4.2: vedanasu vedananupassino viharanti atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, vedanahi visamyutta;
sn47.4:4.3: citte cittanupassino viharanti atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, cittena visamyutta;
sn47.4:4.4: dhammesu dhammanupassino viharanti atapino sampajana ekodibhuta vippasannacitta samahita ekaggacitta, dhammehi visamyutta.
sn47.4:5.1: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nava acirapabbajita adhunagata imam dhammavinayam, te vo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imesam catunnam satipatthananam bhavanaya samadapetabba nivesetabba patitthapetabba”ti.
